name: MyEggTracker
0:
”Alexa, tell My Egg Tracker that our hens laid 9 eggs!”
”Alexa, ask My Egg Tracker how many eggs have we gathered.”
”Alexa, tell My Egg Tracker we found three more eggs.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my egg tracker
des:
Do you keep chickens for their eggs? This skill will help you track their production. Whenever you collect eggs from your hens, tell My Egg Tracker how many you found.

As you collect your eggs, My Egg Tracker records them, even multiple times a day. (If you forget the day before, just tell it the number when you remember!)

When you want to know how many eggs you've collected, just ask My Egg Tracker and it will give you an overall total, and a 1/7/30 day breakdown once you've been logging for long enough. (We're hoping to add full graphs for devices with a screen soon!)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
